extension.summary: Welcome to The Live Box Network!
extension.description: Welcome to The Live Box Network! The Live Box produces video programming for businesses that is curated content to the client. The Live Box features rich, lifestyle programming that helps businesses brand and market to their clients through HDTV's, iPads, Social Media and web. Programming is updated monthly and can include On Location filming segments as well. Find out more by visiting www.thelivebox.com.
